summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CRM system - all core features working correctly

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for creation operations

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with all stats cards (today's leads, total clients, sales count, total paid)
Client management - add, edit, delete, view details
Payments page shows all payments with filtering
Users page (admin only) - view users list
All backend API endpoints (23/23 tests passed)
Dashboard stats API returns correct data structure
